channel.title: What hardware wallets support Radix?
channel.description:
# XRD
## Ledger
* Nano X * Nano S
## Trezor Trezor is not accepting any new network integrations at present.
# EXRD
EXRD is an ERC20 token and is supported by any hardware wallet that supports the Ethereum network.
### Further Reading:
* [Using Ledger Nano S or X with the Radix Desktop Wallet](https://learn.radixdlt.com/article/using-ledger-nano-s-or-x-with-the-radix-desktop-wallet)
